onboarding.residence_page_political_info_check: Politically Exposed Person Natural person who has been entrusted with prominent public function, his/her family members or person who has close business relations with him/her (Business partner, joint Beneficial Ownership). Prominent Public Function: a) Heads of State, heads of government, members of government (ministers) and deputies, heads of government institutions;  b) Members of legislative bodies (parliament);   c) Heads and members of governing bodies of political parties;  d) Members of supreme courts, constitutional courts and other high-level judicial bodies, the decisions of which are not subject to further appeal save in exceptional circumstances;  e) General auditors and deputies, members of courts of auditors;   f) Members of boards of central (national) banks; g) Ambassadors, chargÃ©s d'affaires;  h) High-ranking officers in defense (armed) forces; i) Heads and members of governing bodies of State-owned enterprises; j) Heads, deputies and members of governing bodies of international organizations.

carrefour.seeTotal: See the total number of points <1>here.</1>
carrefour.haveNoPageInfoTxt: To get a Carrefour card, visit us at Re|Bank branches and points of sale or at Carrefour hypermarkets in Tbilisi Mall, East Point, and Rustavi.

desc.0: Transfer money for your daily shopping and use the card at Carrefour markets and any other store in Georgia
desc.1: Get 1% of the amount as MyCLUB points when you pay at Carrefour;
desc.2: Receive 0.5% of the corresponding points at any other store in Georgia;
desc.3: Enjoy additional benefits on the remaining amount at the end of the day with 3% annual interest*;
desc.4: Withdraw money for free from any bank ATM in Georgia.
desc.5: *The 3% interest is credited once a month.

instList: To activate the 2F authentication, either copy the code and paste it into the app or scan the QR code
After adding, a 6-digit code will appear in the authenticator, which must be entered in Internet/Mobile Bank
After entering the 6-digit code, 2F authentication will be activated
